attributes.action: Change Track and award the multi-billion pound contract to Bombardier to safeguard thousands of British jobs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to Change Track
     and award the £7.5bn contract for new carriages to Derby
     train-maker Bombardier

     Gordon Brown and his Government should safeguard thousands of
     British jobs and award the contract to build 1400 new carriages
     for the Intercity Express programme to train-making company
     Bombardier based in Derby, instead of giving it to a Japanese
     firm.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
